SEARCH
Package abm

Class Board

java.lang.Object
abm.Board
public class Board extends Object
The Board class represents the simulation area and manages the agents (stars, planets, and meteorites) within it.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Board(int width, int height)
    This constructor initializes a Board object with the width and height of the simulation area.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAgent(Agent agent)
    This function adds an agent to the board's list of agents.
    List<Agent>
    getAgents()
    This function returns a list containing all the agents currently on the board.
    int
    getMeteoriteCount()
    This function counts and returns the number of meteorites currently on the board.
    int
    getPlanetCount()
    This function counts and returns the number of planets currently on the board.

    removeAgent(Agent agent)
    This function removes an agent from the board's list of agents.

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board(int width, int height)
      This constructor initializes a Board object with the width and height of the simulation area. It creates an empty list to store agents and sets up an InteractionManager with the provided dimensions.
      Parameters:
      width - The width of the simulation area.
      height - The height of the simulation area.

  • Method Details

    • addAgent

      public void addAgent(Agent agent)
      This function adds an agent to the board's list of agents.
      Parameters:
      agent - The agent to add.

    • removeAgent

      public void removeAgent(Agent agent)
      This function removes an agent from the board's list of agents.
      Parameters:
      agent - The agent to remove.

    • getAgents

      public List<Agent> getAgents()
      This function returns a list containing all the agents currently on the board.
      Returns:
      A list of agents.

    • getMeteoriteCount

      public int getMeteoriteCount()
      This function counts and returns the number of meteorites currently on the board.
      Returns:
      The number of meteorites.

    • getPlanetCount

      public int getPlanetCount()
      This function counts and returns the number of planets currently on the board.
      Returns:
      The number of planets.
